      • addAutoApprovedEmailDomains

        java.lang.Void addAutoApprovedEmailDomains(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                                           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> emailDomains)
        Add multiple e-mail domains to the auto-approval list.
        Parameters:
        organizationId - The id of the organization to modify.
        emailDomains - The e-mail domain to add to the auto-approval list.

      • removeAutoApprovedEmailDomains

        java.lang.Void removeAutoApprovedEmailDomains(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                                              java.util.Set<java.lang.String> emailDomain)

      • addAutoApprovedEmailDomain

        java.lang.Void addAutoApprovedEmailDomain(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                                          java.lang.String emailDomain)
        Adds a single e-mail domain to the auto-approval list. This will fail for users who are not an owner of the organization.
        Parameters:
        organizationId - The id of the organization to modify.
        emailDomain - The e-mail domain to add to the auto-approval list.

      • removeAutoApprovedEmailDomain

        java.lang.Void removeAutoApprovedEmailDomain(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                                             java.lang.String emailDomain)
        Removes a single e-mail domain to the auto-approval list. This will fail for users who are not an owner of the organization.
        Parameters:
        organizationId - The id of the organization to modify.
        emailDomain - The e-mail domain to add to the auto-approval list.

      • getPrincipals

        java.util.Set<Principal> getPrincipals(java.util.UUID organizationId)

      • addPrincipals

        java.lang.Void addPrincipals(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                             java.util.Set<Principal> principals)
        This is a convenience call that modifies that grants {@link com.dataloom.authorization.Permission#READ} on the specified organization to the specified principals. A user's membership in an organization is determined by whether or not they have {@link com.dataloom.authorization.Permission#READ} on the organization.
        Parameters:
        organizationId - The id of the organization.
        principals - A set of valid principals.

      • setPrincipals

        java.lang.Void setPrincipals(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                             java.util.Set<Principal> principals)
        This is a convenience call that modifies that grants {@link com.dataloom.authorization.Permission#READ} on the specified organization to the specified principals. A user's membership in an organization is determined by whether or not they have {@link com.dataloom.authorization.Permission#READ} on the organization.
        Parameters:
        organizationId - The id of the organization.
        principals - A set of valid principals.gs

      • removePrincipals

        java.lang.Void removePrincipals(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                                java.util.Set<Principal> principals)
        This is a convenience call that modifies that removes all {@link com.dataloom.authorization.Permission}s that a principal may have on an organization, including discover.
        Parameters:
        organizationId - The id of the organization.
        principals - A set of valid principals

      • getRoles

        java.util.Set<Principal> getRoles(java.util.UUID organizationId)

      • getMembers

        java.util.Set<Principal> getMembers(java.util.UUID organizationId)

      • addPrincipal

        java.lang.Void addPrincipal(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                            PrincipalType principalType,
                            java.lang.String principalId)
        This is a convenience call that grants {@link com.dataloom.authorization.Permission#READ} to a principal on an organization.
        Parameters:
        organizationId - The id of the organization.
        principalType - The principal type of the principal being added.
        principalId - The principalId of the principal being added.

      • removePrincipal

        java.lang.Void removePrincipal(java.util.UUID organizationId,
                               PrincipalType principalType,
                               java.lang.String principalId)
        This is a convenience call that removes all {@link com.dataloom.authorization.Permission}s that a principal may have on an organization, including discover.
        Parameters:
        organizationId - The id of the organization.
        principalType - The principal type of the principal being added.
        principalId - The principalId of the principal being added.
